role.argrole: thing arg0 has no achievement in

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 但)) (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 寻找) (NP-OBJ (QP (OD 十七) (CLP (M 世))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 转世)))) (NP (NN 活佛))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 却)) (VP (VP-FOC (VV 历经) (QP-OBJ (ADVP (AD 将近)) (QP (CD 十) (CLP (M 年))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 都)) (VP (VV 毫无所获))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 寻找 十七 世 *OP* *T*-1 转世 活佛
